languages.text: "Мой жизненный опыт... если вы понимаете, о чем я... говорит, что среди аборигенов нашлись бы те, кто готов за спокойную жизнь на корабле предать своих вождей. Пускай те, кто знает Айон-VI, сами имеют с ней дело на службе мне".

traits.locale_text: "Мой жизненный опыт... если вы понимаете, о чем я... говорит, что среди аборигенов нашлись бы те, кто готов за спокойную жизнь на корабле предать своих вождей. Пускай те, кто знает Айон-VI, сами имеют с ней дело на службе мне".

languages.text: "If my... particular life experiences are any indication, some of the natives would eagerly betray their chieftains in exchange for a quiet life serving on board my ship. I would then leave dealing with Aion VI to those who know it best."
languages.original_text: "Мой жизненный опыт... если вы понимаете, о чем я... говорит, что среди аборигенов нашлись бы те, кто готов за спокойную жизнь на корабле предать своих вождей. Пускай те, кто знает Айон-VI, сами имеют с ней дело на службе мне".

traits.locale_text: "If my... particular life experiences are any indication, there would be those among the natives who would eagerly betray their chieftains in exchange for a calm life aboard the ship. Let those who know Aion-VI deal with its quirks as they serve me."

"If my... particular life experiences are any indication, there would be those among the natives who would eagerly betray their chieftains in exchange for a calm life aboard the ship. Let those who know Aion-VI deal with its quirks as they serve me."

"If my... particular life experiences are any indication, some of the natives would eagerly betray their chieftains in exchange for a quiet life serving on board my ship. I would then leave dealing with Aion VI to those who know it best."

"If my... particular life experiences are any indication, some of the natives would eagerly betray their chieftains in exchange for a quiet life serving on board my ship. I would then leave dealing with Aion VI to those who know it best."

"If my... particular life experiences are any indication, some of the natives would eagerly betray their chieftains in exchange for a quiet life serving on board my ship. I would then leave dealing with Aion VI to those who know it best."

languages.text: “如果说，我……过往的经历让我明白了什么事情，那就是：一部分当地土著肯定很乐于背叛他们的酋长，换取在我的船上安然生活的特权。叛乱结束之后，我就会把艾恩六号星上的事务交给最熟悉那颗行星的人们。”
languages.original_text: "If my... particular life experiences are any indication, some of the natives would eagerly betray their chieftains in exchange for a quiet life serving on board my ship. I would then leave dealing with Aion VI to those who know it best."

traits.locale_text: “如果说，我……过往的经历让我明白了什么事情，那就是：一部分当地土著肯定很乐于背叛他们的酋长，换取在我的船上安然生活的特权。叛乱结束之后，我就会把艾恩六号星上的事务交给最熟悉那颗行星的人们。”

languages.text: «Si mis... experiencias personales sirven de ejemplo, algunos nativos no dudarían en traicionar a sus jefes a cambio de una vida apacible a bordo de la nave. Hecho esto, dejaría la situación de Aion VI en manos de quienes mejor la conocen».
languages.original_text: "If my... particular life experiences are any indication, some of the natives would eagerly betray their chieftains in exchange for a quiet life serving on board my ship. I would then leave dealing with Aion VI to those who know it best."

traits.locale_text: «Si mis... experiencias personales sirven de ejemplo, algunos nativos no dudarían en traicionar a sus jefes a cambio de una vida apacible a bordo de la nave. Hecho esto, dejaría la situación de Aion VI en manos de quienes mejor la conocen».

languages.text: 「私が…過去に経験したことが何かの兆候であるとすれば、原住民の中には私の船での静かな生活と引き換えに、族長を裏切ることを厭わない者もいるでしょう。その場合、私はアイオン・VIの扱いを熟知している者たちに任せます」
languages.original_text: "If my... particular life experiences are any indication, some of the natives would eagerly betray their chieftains in exchange for a quiet life serving on board my ship. I would then leave dealing with Aion VI to those who know it best."

traits.locale_text: 「私が…過去に経験したことが何かの兆候であるとすれば、原住民の中には私の船での静かな生活と引き換えに、族長を裏切ることを厭わない者もいるでしょう。その場合、私はアイオン・VI の扱いを熟知している者たちに任せます」
「私が…過去に経験したことが何かの兆候であるとすれば、原住民の中には私の船での静かな生活と引き換えに、族長を裏切ることを厭わない者もいるでしょう。その場合、私はアイオン・VIの扱いを熟知している者たちに任せます」

languages.text: « Si j'en crois mon... expérience, certains indigènes trahiraient volontiers leurs chefs en échange d'une vie paisible à bord de mon vaisseau. Je laisserais ensuite le soin de s'occuper d'Éon-VI à ceux qui connaissent le mieux ce monde. »
languages.original_text: "If my... particular life experiences are any indication, some of the natives would eagerly betray their chieftains in exchange for a quiet life serving on board my ship. I would then leave dealing with Aion VI to those who know it best."

traits.locale_text: « Si j'en crois mon... expérience, certains indigènes trahiraient volontiers leurs chefs en échange d'une vie paisible à bord de mon vaisseau. Je laisserais ensuite le soin de s'occuper d'Éon-VI à ceux qui connaissent le mieux ce monde. »

languages.text: "Falls meine ... Lebenserfahrung irgendetwas zählt, gibt es bestimmt einige Einheimische, die für ein ruhiges Leben an Bord meines Schiffs jederzeit ihre Häuptlinge verraten würden. Und dann würde ich Aion VI denen überlassen, die es am besten kennen."
languages.original_text: "If my... particular life experiences are any indication, some of the natives would eagerly betray their chieftains in exchange for a quiet life serving on board my ship. I would then leave dealing with Aion VI to those who know it best."

traits.locale_text: "Falls meine ... Lebenserfahrung irgendetwas zählt, gibt es bestimmt einige Einheimische, die für ein ruhiges Leben an Bord meines Schiffs jederzeit ihre Häuptlinge verraten würden. Und dann würde ich Aion VI denen überlassen, die es am besten kennen."

languages.text: "Önceden kazandığım... Birtakım deneyimler eşliğinde diyebilirim ki, yerli halktan bazıları gemimde hizmet verecekleri sakin bir yaşam karşılığında şeflerine hevesle ihanet edeceklerdi. Sonrasında da Aion VI ile uğraşmayı bu işi en iyi bilenlere bırakırdım."
languages.original_text: "If my... particular life experiences are any indication, some of the natives would eagerly betray their chieftains in exchange for a quiet life serving on board my ship. I would then leave dealing with Aion VI to those who know it best."

traits.locale_text: "Önceden kazandığım... Birtakım deneyimler eşliğinde diyebilirim ki, yerli halktan bazıları gemimde hizmet verecekleri sakin bir yaşam karşılığında şeflerine hevesle ihanet edeceklerdi. Sonrasında da Aion VI ile uğraşmayı bu işi en iyi bilenlere bırakırdım."
